name: Tee Shirt "i'm dirty"
description: Cute pink tee with original illustration of a little piglet on the front. On the back, the printed words “i’m dirty” are centered. Bottom right are literal definitions of pig and dirty, just for reference. Also centered on the back top, in small print is “A _ Project” – the designer’s mark. These are original designs by Richard Gleason, a graphic designer, and are hand pulled by a boutique screenprinter.
